channel.title: New server need coders and scripters or some help on that stuff
channel.description:
yeah like i said i need help on entering the codes and stuff cause i tried going on to the file characters (this is megascape btw) and i looked at my characters txt file and edited it to 99 stats and stuff but it wont save for some reason and i need to know how to spawn monsters and items and stuff like that with the text saving when i click save on "file". help would be appreciated and if you are willing to stick around ill make you a admin or mod its your choice. oh yeah and uh how would i make commands that work in the game and get rid of commands?
server is either dark-scape.no-ip.org or 5.56.197.107
need hamachi for this though.....server name in hamachi or network name is dark-scape.no-ip.org password is darkscape
ok server is now under construction of project 16 instead of megascape will be done either tommarrow (august 9th) this is western time ...megascape server is finished and like i said project 16 version is like dark-scape2 ...this server requires hamachi as i said and the network is dark-scape.no-ip.org the password is darkscape and i made a second one just in case i need it it is dark-scape2.no-ip.org and password is darkscape. in file in "new server" put in 5.56.197.107..thanks to those people that have been on my server. i am glad u like it [br][size=1]Posted at: August 01, 2006, 12:07:17 AM[/size][hr]forums released (small) for questions and codes and talking u know the simple things in a server the link is http://darkscapeadmin.proboards103.com/index.cgi

item.title: New server need coders and scripters or some help on that stuff
item.dc:creator: @knight knight
item.description:
@knight wrote:

hey guys i got a new server runner thanks to lawl from moparisthebest forums and we are now online 24/7…added 3 more networks but ill list them all
network password
dark-scape.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape2.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape3.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape4.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape5.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape6.no-ip.org darkscape
dark-scape7.no-ip.org darkscape

you dont need hamachi for this…you can login to it with the ip dark-scape.no-ip.org hamachi is just to leave messages but you can also login from there…the ip to login from hamachi is 5.56.197.107…thanks

(going on vacation today[august 17…few hours…right now its 5 mins to 9 am {western time} ill be back on august 21st] in the meantime have fun and if anything goes wrong it has a 30 min auto restarter (once again thanks to lawl) whenever the auto restarter has 5 mins left it shows “system update” in the left down corner of the screen which is a timer of how long until restart…

http://darkscapeadmin.proboards103.com/index.cgi?
forums
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 06:03:14 AM[/size][hr]alright server is down (im sure you all know) but you can visit the new forums at www.darkscape2007.x47.net (still modifying but its good enough to start posting and stuff)

Read full topic
